analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/7/0xc239b871cbf9c60f022676700663c552a086717d.sol:
	Contract TelomereToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/7/0xc239b871cbf9c60f022676700663c552a086717d.sol#244-247)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
